mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(user_id, title, content) value(#{userId},#{title},#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, created_at = now() WHERE community_id = #{communityId}
mapper.select: SELECT community_id, user_id, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at FROM community WHERE community_id = #{communityId}

SELECT community_id, c.user_id, title, c.content, c.created_at, nickname FROM community c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{countPerPage}
